description:
Being cold at the crag will be a thing of the past for you and your shoes with this Telendos hoody. With its thick cotton design and special side pocket for your shoes, you’ll be crushing those flashes with ease.

  • It’s made of 100% certified organic cotton yarns that respect the environment and offer comfort and warmth
  • It has a side zippered pocket that allows you to keep your climbing shoes warm in between outdoor attempts, while the hood and kangaroo pocket offer comforts of a classic hoody design
  • It also has a dovetail back hem design that brings a subtle touch of style
name: La Sportiva Telendos Hoody - Men's
